title: Group portrait of man wearing moustache, light colored bow tie, and flower on left lapel, standing with smiling bride, wearing headpiece with mid length veil, earrings, necklace, light colored sheer short sleeve jacket, and light colored strapless wedding dress with floral lace ruffles on tiered skirt, gathered behind table with light colored tablecloth and four tiered wedding cake in interior with furniture and painting, possibly at 2007 Metropolitan Street in Manchester
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
